content.p: Associate Professor of Financial Economics and Director of Student Experience, Engagement and Employability, Faculty of Social Sciences I teach level 1 Economics, Macroeconomics and Financial Economics. My research area is in Financial Economics.Specifically, I am interested to look into issues related to suitanability and ESG. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
